            :op1 (y / yep)
            :op2 (o / odd))
      :snt2 (d / descend-01

            :ARG1 (m2 / mountain)
            :condition (ii / issue-02
                  :ARG1-of (m3 / major-02))

            :manner (t / turn-01

                  :ARG1 y2
                  :direction (s / slash
                        :op1 (c2 / city

                                    :op1 "Marseilles"))
                        :op2 (c3 / coast)))))
